## Goal
Run the browser compatibility checklist and record pass/fail outcomes for the current release candidate.

## References
- Matrix: plans/browser-validation-matrix.md
- Checklist: plans/release-checklist.md

## Scope
- Latest Chrome
- Latest Edge
- Latest Safari
- Latest Firefox

## Tasks
- [ ] Fill Test Environment metadata in matrix
- [ ] Run all test cases in Chrome
- [ ] Run all test cases in Edge
- [ ] Run all test cases in Safari
- [ ] Run all test cases in Firefox
- [ ] Record pass/fail and notes in results matrix
- [ ] Log any defects under Bugs / Follow-ups

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Matrix is fully completed with versions and outcomes
- [ ] Blocking issues are identified and triaged
- [ ] No unresolved critical issues remain for release

## Deliverables
- Updated plans/browser-validation-matrix.md
- Linked defect issues (if any)
